mapper.select: select C.*, P.*,(select club_approve_yn from club_member where club_code = C.club_no and emp_id=#{memberId}) club_approve_yn from (select * from club order by ${sort} asc) C left join club_photo P on C.club_no = P.club_no

select C.*, P.* from (select * from club where club_no in (select club_code from club_member where emp_id=#{memberId} and club_approve_yn = 'Y') order by ${sort} asc) C left join club_photo P on C.club_no = P.club_no

select C.*, P.* from (select * from club where club_no in (select club_code from club_member where emp_id=#{memberId} and club_approve_yn = 'N') order by ${sort} asc) C left join club_photo P on C.club_no = P.club_no
select * from club_plan where club_no = #{clubNo} and extract(month from club_plan_start) = extract(month from sysdate) order by club_plan_start, club_plan_no asc
mapper.update: update club_plan set club_plan_title = #{clubPlanTitle}, club_plan_content = #{clubPlanContent}, club_plan_start = #{clubPlanStart}, club_plan_state = #{clubPlanState}, club_plan_place = #{clubPlanPlace}, club_plan_manager = #{clubPlanManager} where club_plan_no = #{clubPlanNo}
mapper.select: select * from club_notice N left join club_member C on N.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id where club_no = #{clubNo} order by club_notice_date desc
select * from club_member where emp_id = #{memberId} and club_code = #{clubNo}
select * from club_photo P left join club_member C on P.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id where club_no = #{clubNo} order by club_photo_date desc

select A.* , M.member_id, M.renamed_filename, M.member_name from club_plan_attendee A left join club_member C on A.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id where A.club_plan_no = #{clubPlanNo} order by A.club_plan_attendee_date desc

select N.*, M.member_name, M.renamed_filename from club_notice_comment N left join club_member C on N.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id where club_no = #{clubNo}
